food.name: Anduin River Fish
food.description: Freshly caught fish from the Anduin River, grilled to perfection and served with a side of herbed quinoa and steamed vegetables.

food.name: Elven Starlight Salad
food.description: A fresh mix of greens, fruits, and nuts, topped with a zesty Elven vinaigrette and garnished with edible flowers.

food.name: Rivendell Roast
food.description: A slow-cooked roast of lamb or beef, served with a side of roasted root vegetables and a drizzle of Elven honey.

drinks.name: Elven Wine
drinks.description: A crisp and refreshing white wine made from the grapes of the Elven vineyards.

drinks.name: Dwarven Ale
drinks.description: A rich and malty beer brewed in the depths of the Dwarven mines.

drinks.name: Rivendell Mead
drinks.description: A sweet and honeyed mead made from the nectar of the Elven bees.

drinks.name: Anduin River Cider
drinks.description: A refreshing and tangy cider made from the apples of the Anduin Valley.
